name: @mkrause/lifecycle-loader
description: Utilities for managing the state lifecycle of async loaded data
author: mkrause

scripts.build:cjs: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir lib-cjs --source-maps inline
scripts.build:esm: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --out-dir lib-esm --source-maps inline
scripts.prepare: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && cp flow/index.js.flow lib-cjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && cp flow/index.js.flow lib-cjs
